UPSAuthInsertExistingProductOrPart.Title: Insert Existing
UPSAuthInsertExistingProductOrPart.Short: Adds an existing product, part or representation inside the structure.
UPSAuthInsertExistingProductOrPart.LongH:
Select one or several products as parent and then, through a search, select one of the following 3DEXPERIENCE objects to be inserted: product, part, shape or drawing.

This command is compatible with Change Action (including with configuration).
UPSAuthReplaceByExisting.Title: Replace by Existing
UPSAuthReplaceByExisting.ShortHelp: Replaces an object by an existing object of the same type.
UPSAuthReplaceByExisting.LongHelp: Select an object, and then select an existing object using a search.
UPSReplaceByLatestRevision.Title: Replace by Latest Revision
UPSReplaceByLatestRevision.ShortHelp: Replaces a product or part with its latest revision (if any), to update your structure with the latest modification (not available for representations).
UPSReplaceByLatestRevision.LongHelp: Select one or several products (except the root) or parts before launching this command.
UPSAuthReplaceByRevision.Title: Replace by Revision
UPSAuthReplaceByRevision.ShortHelp:
Updates the selected products or parts of a structure with an existing revision (not available for representations).

The Replace by Revision panel displays the product structure in a flat view.
UPSAuthRevisionUpdate.Title: Update Revisions
UPSAuthRevisionUpdate.ShortHelp:
Updates a structure with an existing revision of its products and parts (not available for representations).

The Update Revision panel displays the product structure in a hierarchical view. In the first column, a symbol indicates if the current revision can be replaced.
UPSAuthUnparent.Title: Detach
UPSAuthUnparent.ShortHelp: Removes the selected instance from the structure.
UPSAuthUnparent.LongHelp: This command is compatible with Change Action (including with configuration).
UPSAuthReorderProduct.Title: Reorder
UPSAuthReorderProduct.ShortHelp: Reorders children of the selected assembly.
